channel.title: [HELP] NPC's
channel.description: Hi community. well i have a little question for you guys... when i add the coordinates of the place for I to put the npc... he doens't appear... I think I must do something else before... but dunno what to do xD any help guys ?

If someone could Help, I really apreciate that xD

item.title: [HELP] NPC's
item.dc:creator: @Balazyo94 Balazyo94
item.description:
@Balazyo94 wrote:

[code]So what do I have to do is only create codes like this ?:

npc =// ID LV HP MaxHit Respawt WN SD Atk Block Die AD NN ND npc = 50 276 240 25 20 8 90 91 89 92 6 King_Black_Dragon

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] NPC's
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Why you sorry??
The question is who wasn’t a ‘noob’ at some time…

npc = 475 19 150 30 30 8 30 7063 7061 7064 6 Brawler A Brawler. npc = 258 112 435 42 30 8 30 7063 7061 7064 6 Brawler A Brawler. npc = 115 53 320 31 60 [b]8[/b] 30 7063 7061 7064 6 Ogre A Ogre. npc = 7997 717 5000 80 500 [b]8[/b] 30 7063 7061 7064 6 War Beast The War Beast.

[ENDOFNPCLIST]

Okay I am going to help you.
The config files, (.cfg) are very strict about the spacing, so I have bolded a very noticible difference in the spacing between two lines from your code for you to see.
Always use the TAB key when spacing, I don’t, I just copy and paste another line from the config file and change the coords etc, or add this command for npc spawning:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,432838.msg3177318.html#msg3177318

Read full topic
